articles.content: Team India return from the 2023 men's World Boxing Championships with a record haul of three medals (all bronze) -- a performance that bodes well for the near future of men's boxing in the country. D… [+6201 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Shooter Rhythm breaks world record but misses medal - Rediff.com
articles.description: India registered a no-medal day for the first time in the tournament. Even though Rhythm topped qualification with her 595, teammates Esha Singh and Manu shot 582 and 578 respectively to finish at 13th and 27th positions.
articles.content: IMAGE: Rhythm also broke the junior women's 25m pistol world record, which was set 34 years ago by Russian Nino Salukvadze who shot 593 at the European Championship in Zagreb. Photograph: NRAI/Twitte… [+2012 chars]

articles.title: Warriors, ousted in 6, agree: This was not a championship team - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: After being "barely in the playoff picture most of this year," the Warriors' quest to defend their NBA title ended Friday night with a 122-101 loss to the Lakers in Game 6 of the second round.

articles.title: Lakers eliminate Warriors in 6 games, advance to West finals - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: A Lakers team that started the season 2-10 is now four wins away from the NBA Finals after taking down the defending champion Warriors in six games behind a vintage performance from LeBron James.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES -- The Lakers started the season eight games under .500. Now they're four wins away from the NBA Finals.
